Title: NFE resumes LNG production at Altamira after planned maintenance
Description: US-based LNG project developer New Fortress Energy, or NFE, resumed production at its 1.4 mtpa Altamira Fast LNG unit offshore Mexico following scheduled maintenance after shipping its first cargo earlier this month.
Author: JS

Title: Second Arctic LNG 2 liquefaction train arrives at destination
Description: The second liquefaction train on a gravity-based structure for Novatek's sanctioned 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 plant in Russiaâ€™s Gydan peninsula arrived at its destination over the weekend, which will boost the facility's production capacity.
Author: JS
